page.title: 02Children's Names-A Survey
page.content: First we had to find out which names were popular about ten years ago.We tried to find out which was the most popular name among the fourth year juniors, but we found that there were not enough children to give us a reasonable sample.So we used third year childrens' names too.Then we listed all the girls' mums' names and the boys' dads' names to find out which names were used thirty to forty forty years ago.Lastly our local vicar told us the names of the children christened in the last two years. The most popular name for baby boys was Christopher and for baby girls was Hannah.The most popular names in in the third and fourth of our school for girls are Joanne and Claire and for boys is Stephen.The most common mothers' name is Susan,and for fathers, it is John.
